Sentencas: There is increasing interest in zero-carbon-emission power to prevent global warming.
Titulo: Effect of oxygen supply method on the performance of a micro gas turbine-based triple combined cycle with oxy-combustion carbon capture

Sentencas: This study investigated an effective way to minimize the efficiency penalty and achieve near-zero carbon emission in a small-scale triple combined cycle.
Titulo: Effect of oxygen supply method on the performance of a micro gas turbine-based triple combined cycle with oxy-combustion carbon capture

Sentencas: The power block of the cycle includes a solid oxide fuel cell, micro gas turbine, and organic Rankine cycle.
Titulo: Effect of oxygen supply method on the performance of a micro gas turbine-based triple combined cycle with oxy-combustion carbon capture

Sentencas: The three oxy-combustion capture systems are a semi-closed cycle, a cycle using an ion transport membrane, and a cycle where the membrane is replaced with an air separation unit.
Titulo: Effect of oxygen supply method on the performance of a micro gas turbine-based triple combined cycle with oxy-combustion carbon capture

Sentencas: A parametric analysis was performed to determine an optimal pressure ratio for each cycle.
Titulo: Effect of oxygen supply method on the performance of a micro gas turbine-based triple combined cycle with oxy-combustion carbon capture

Sentencas: The performance characteristics of the three cycles and a cycle with conventional post-combustion capture were compared.
Titulo: Effect of oxygen supply method on the performance of a micro gas turbine-based triple combined cycle with oxy-combustion carbon capture

Sentencas: It was found out that the cycle using an air separation unit is more efficient than the other two cycles and captures highly pure carbon dioxide.
Titulo: Effect of oxygen supply method on the performance of a micro gas turbine-based triple combined cycle with oxy-combustion carbon capture

Sentencas: The efficiency penalty due to carbon capture is only 4.4%, resulting in 58% net efficiency.
Titulo: Effect of oxygen supply method on the performance of a micro gas turbine-based triple combined cycle with oxy-combustion carbon capture

Sentencas: The most significant finding is that using the cryogenic air separation unit is more favorable than using the ion transport membrane to separate oxygen in a small triple combined cycle operating at low pressure, in contrast to one with high pressure.
Titulo: Effect of oxygen supply method on the performance of a micro gas turbine-based triple combined cycle with oxy-combustion carbon capture
